title: ADVISORY: President Obama to Travel to Greensboro, NC | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
October 08, 2016

 



ADVISORY: President Obama to Travel to Greensboro, NC





	WASHINGTON, DC - On Tuesday, October 11, the President will travel to North Carolina A&T State University in Greensboro, North Carolina, to participate in a student forum hosted by ESPN to discuss the My Brother's Keeper initiative and the role and legacy of Historically Black Colleges and Universities.

	The Presidentâ€™s participation in the student forum will be pooled press.

	Members of the media who wish to cover the arrival and/or departure of Air Force One must RSVP via the following link by 10:00AM ET Monday, October 8: https://obamawhitehouse.archives.gov/webform/media-rsvp-air-force-one-arrival-and-departure-greensboro-north-carolina
